channel.title: Question on gangscape V.4 Menus (How to add another one!)
channel.description:
Question: how do i add another menu uner the "moreinfo" menu button on the quest tab on gangscape V.4?
Description: i want to know how i add another menu under the others, but i dont know how and i cant find anyone who will help me!
so if you know how to add one please tell me I will rep +++ you if it works![br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 11:14:19 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Question on gangscape V.4 Menus (How to add another one!)
item.dc:creator: @master_montage master_montage
item.source: Question on gangscape V.4 Menus (How to add another one!)

item.title: Question on gangscape V.4 Menus (How to add another one!)
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Search for public void SpamMenu() in client.java

Right above that, paste this

	public void ServerHelpMenu()
	{

					sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144);  //Title
					clearQuestInterface();
					sendQuest("@dbl@Server Information", 8145);
					sendQuest("@dbl@Server IP: @gre@"+"[Your IP]", 8147);
					sendQuest("@dbl@Players Online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8148);
				        sendQuest("@dbl@Server Creator/Owner: [Name], 8149);
                                        sendQuest("@dbl@Server Admins: [Your Admins], 8150);
				        sendQuest(" ", 8151);
				        sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@"+" ---", 8152);
				        sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @red@"+"[Your Website]", 8153);
				       	sendQuestSomething(8143);
					showInterface(8134);
					flushOutStream();

				}

Fill in your information in the brackets.

Read full topic

item.title: Question on gangscape V.4 Menus (How to add another one!)
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

Add this case:

sendQuest("@gre@name of menu here", 7332);
case 7332:
    yourMenuVoid();
break;
